TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 包含指定返回 UI 自动化元素时所使用的引用类型的值。

span.span: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements.

summary.span: 这些值在 属性中使用。

span.span: These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完全是默认设置，并指定返回的元素，包含对基础的完全引用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 一个指定返回的元素具有未引用基础 UI 中，并且包含缓存的信息。None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. 对于元素，某些操作如或，需要完整的参考; 尝试执行这些上都未元素会导致。Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 使用无，可能更高效，当需要时只有属性，它可以避免开销参与设置完整的引用。Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将模式设置上。The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定返回的元素具有对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定返回的元素没有对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 的引用并且只包含缓存的信息。

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: 例如，此模式可能用于检索列表框中的项的名称，而不获取对项本身的引用。

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
